2. However, if both of us pick B, we each get 12$. Since there are 75 rounds and I expect us to play B against each other half of the time (37.5 times), my expected payoff for these rounds is 25.

   - Expected payoff when I pick B: (25 + 18.75) * number of times I pick B = 43.75 * number of times I pick B
